text: Sri Jayawardenepura Kotte, or Sri Jayewardenepura Kotte, is also known as Kotte. It is the official capital of Sri Lanka. Sri Jayawardenepura Kotte is in the urban area of Colombo. ==References== Category:Settlements in Sri Lanka Category:National capitals in Asia Category:Colombo
title: Sri Jayawardenepura Kotte
